title: Sebastian's Desire
description: Clover O'Brien was struggling to pay the bills until she finally landed a job as a cleaner at Romano industries. With only one problem. Her handsome boss wouldn't stop hitting on her. But with a younger brother to provide for, Clover hasn't got time for men.  Sebastian Romano was a man who always got what he wanted. Being one of the wealthiest men in the world with an ex-modeling career, things came easy. Yet something from his life was missing.  He may have just found what he's looking for in his reluctant cleaner.  Will Sebastian's charms prove too much for her to resist? Will their connected pasts bring them together or drive them apart?
author: R.M. Healy
